title: Augmented Reality and Virtual Reality Integrated Instructional Design for [Large-Scale] Mathematics Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital tool proficiency and mathematics instruction experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement for in-service math teachers integrating VR/AR technologies into lessons, applying the TSED (Technology-Enhanced Science Education Design) model for staged experiential learning.

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more lesson plans visualizing mathematical concepts using AR/VR technology according to the TSED model
Learners can demonstrate augmented reality lessons using 3D geometric models with digital devices at least twice
Learners can develop and submit AR/VR-integrated lesson materials applicable to actual classrooms through project-based assessments

resources: VR Educational Content Linked to Mathematics Curriculum

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
